reset_password_seo_description: Reset your password to sign in to your Stocknear account.

welcome_subtitle: Your subscription pays for itself with just one better trade decision. Join thousands of investors making smarter, data-driven choices.
welcome_thanks: Thank you for subscribing to Stocknear! You've made a smart investment that typically pays for itself with just one prevented loss or better-timed trade.
welcome_access_info: You now have access to the same institutional-grade tools and real-time data that hedge funds pay thousands for monthly. Need assistance with any feature? Our support team is here to help at
